about.apiUsageDisclaimer: All API usage complies with the respective terms of service of Spotify and Setlist.fm.
about.developedWith: This project was developed using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS.
about.fillOutFormBelow: Have questions, feedback, need support, or found a bug? Fill out the form below to contact us:
about.setlistFmAPIDisclaimer: <setlistFmLink>Setlist.fm</setlistFmLink> is a trademark of Live Nation Entertainment, Inc. This app is not endorsed by or affiliated with Setlist.fm.
about.spotifyAPIDisclaimer: <spotifyLink>Spotify</spotifyLink> is a trademark of Spotify AB. This app is not endorsed by or affiliated with Spotify.
about.usesAPIs: This application uses the Spotify API and Setlist.fm API.
about.whatIsThisAppDescription: This web app allows users to generate Spotify playlists based on setlists from live performances using Setlist.fm data. Users can customise their playlists by excluding specific songs before exporting them to their Spotify account.

account.digitOfOTP: Digit {{digit}} of one time password code
account.enterOTPCode: Enter the one time password code
account.invalidCode: The provided code is either invalid or expired.
account.noAccountLinkedToEmail: No account linked to this email!
account.passwordError: Password must be 8-32 characters, contain at least one number, one special character, one lowercase and one uppercase letter.
account.passwordResetEmailSent: An email has been sent for you to reset your password.
account.permanentAction: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
account.resetPasswordMessage: You've been sent a 6-digit code to your email. Enter it below to reset your password.
account.signUpSuccess: Sign-up successful! You can now log in.
account.usernameError: Username must be 3-20 characters, and can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes.

common.404PageMessage: This page can't be found, sorry!
common.500PageMessage: Something's gone wrong on our end, sorry!
common.needToLogIn: You need to log in to access this feature!
common.spotifyAuthorisationRequired: You need to authorise with Spotify to continue!
common.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

exportSetlist.dropzoneMessage: Drag & drop a playlist cover image here, or click to select one.
exportSetlist.errorProcessingImage: Error processing image or file size too large.
exportSetlist.fetchSongDetailsFailed: Failed to fetch Spotify song details!
exportSetlist.spotifyAuthMessage: You need to authorise with Spotify to continue.
exportSetlist.spotifySearchTrackError: Error searching for song on Spotify!

generateSetlist.queryLimitReached: Daily query limit reached. Please try again later.

landingPage.feature1Description: Keep track of your created playlists and access them anytime.
landingPage.feature2Description: Easily integrate with Spotify and save playlists directly to your account.
landingPage.feature3Description: Deleting a playlist on Spotify doesn't mean it's gone forever.
landingPage.generateSetlistDescription: Use this AI tool to create the next predicted setlist for any artist.
landingPage.landingPageDescription: Effortlessly create Spotify playlists from your favourite artists' live performances.
landingPage.whyCreateAccountDescription: Unlock exclusive features by creating an account. Save playlists, recover deleted playlists, and more!

privacyPolicy.accountInformationContent: Username, email address, and password (stored securely as a hash).
privacyPolicy.contactUsContent: If you have any questions or requests regarding your privacy, please contact us through our <aboutLink>support page</aboutLink>.
privacyPolicy.howWeUseDataContent: We use your data to provide and improve our services, generate Spotify playlists, personalise your experience, ensure security, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell your data.
privacyPolicy.introductionContent: Welcome to Setlist to Playlist. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our website and services.
privacyPolicy.setlistDataContent: Any setlists you export, when logged in.
privacyPolicy.spotifyDataContent: Spotify access tokens to generate playlists, stored through secure cookies.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsContent: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your data, withdraw consent, and request a copy of stored data.

setlistSearch.searchForSetlist: Search for an artist/band or setlist.fm link

userPlaylists.noPlaylistsCreated: You haven't created any playlists yet!
userPlaylists.playlistRecovered: Playlist successfully recovered to your Spotify account!
